localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Use data from your APIs, databases, or integrations to empower every team to grow your business’s bottom-line. Leverage OKRs and KPIs to cultivate a culture of accountability, transparency, and autonomy by focusing on your outcomes, not outputs.
blogPost.body: Use data from your APIs, databases, or integrations to empower every team to grow your business’s bottom-line. Leverage OKRs and KPIs to cultivate a culture of accountability, transparency, and autonomy by focusing on your outcomes, not outputs.
blogPost.title: Commonality - Turn your data into real results with KPIs and OKRs
blogPost.author: Kevin William David

localize.description: 使用来自您的 API、数据库或集成的数据，赋予每个团队权力，以增长您的业务底线。利用 OKR 和 KPI，通过关注您的结果而非产出，培养一种问责、透明和自主的文化。
localize.tagline: 通过KPI和OKR将数据转化为真实的结果。

localize.description: 使用來自您的 API、數據庫或集成的數據，賦予每個團隊權力，以增長您的業務底線。利用 OKR 和 KPI，通過關注您的結果而非產出，培養一種問責、透明和自主的文化。
localize.tagline: 通過KPI和OKR將數據轉化爲真實的結果。
